LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.label: arcane mask
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.desciption: An artistically impressive mask emanating arcane energy. Hides the face of the wearer but provides little physical protection. Its special materials enhance the wearer's magical sensitivity and dissipate arcane load.
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.label: arcane cape
LanguageData.VPE_Apparel_EltexMask.desciption: A long cape of mystical design. It hangs over one side of the torso. Its special materials enhance the wearer's magical sensitivity and dissipate arcane load.
